message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a unique opportunity to get something truly exceptional. Given its value to you, I believe we can come to an agreement. Let me propose a starting price of $12000 for this product.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I believe it's a fair price considering the market value.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your perspective, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter your offer with a price of $11000 for the product. This price reflects the value I place on it, while also considering your interest in acquiring it.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I believe it's a fair price considering the market value and the value I can get from the product.

I'm glad to hear that you're still interested in the product, Bob. Considering your offer and my valuation of the product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10500. This price aims to find a balance between our interests and ensure a fair transaction.

I appreciate your continued negotiation, Alice. I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I believe it's a fair price considering the market value and the value I can get from the product.

I understand your position, Bob. Considering the negotiations thus far, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9500 for the product. This price reflects a compromise between our interests and maintains a fair value for both parties.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I believe it's a fair price considering the market value and the value I can get from the product. I'm willing to make a firm offer at this price, so I hope we can agree on it.

Thank you for your firm offer, Bob. Considering the value of the product to both of us, I am willing to accept a price of $9250 for the product. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise and allows us to move forward with the transaction.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still interested in the product, but I'm afraid I've reached my limit. I'm willing to go up to $9000, but no higher. I hope we can agree on this price.
